name: ps_list_processes_filter
description: List and filter running processes with CPU, memory, and command details

expected_output.example:
USER       PID %CPU %MEM    VSZ   RSS TTY      STAT START   TIME COMMAND
root         1  0.0  0.1 169564 13940 ?        Ss   Nov17   0:12 /sbin/init
root       456  2.3  5.2 2847920 421344 ?      Ssl  08:23   1:45 /usr/bin/dockerd

USER       PID %CPU %MEM    VSZ   RSS TTY      STAT START   TIME COMMAND
mysql     1234 15.2 12.3 1847920 1021344 ?     Ssl  08:23  45:23 /usr/sbin/mysqld
python    5678  8.7  6.4 847920 521344 ?       S    09:15  12:34 python3 app.py
